data.comment: A total of 22121 spectators is reported.

Los Angeles push forward at Banc of California Stadium and Diego Rossi gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Miami defence.

Los Angeles drive upfield and Carlos Vela gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Miami defender.

Throw-in Los Angeles.
Allen Chapman blows against Miami's Matias Pellegrini for offside.

Throw-in for Los Angeles at Banc of California Stadium.

Diego Rossi of Los Angeles smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Los Angeles in the half of Miami.

Miami's Lewis Morgan is on target but unsuccessful.
Los Angeles to take a throw-in in Miami territory.
Los Angeles pushes forward through Diego Rossi, whose finish on goal is saved.
Carlos Vela for Los Angeles drives towards goal at Banc of California Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Jordan Harvey (Los Angeles) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in for Miami in their own half.

Los Angeles awarded a free kick in their own half.
Los Angeles push forward at Banc of California Stadium and Tristan Blackmon gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Miami defence.

Brian Rodriguez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Los Angeles.
In Los Angeles a free kick has been awarded the away team.

Goal! Carlos Vela gives Los Angeles a 1-0 lead.

Miami needs to be cautious. Los Angeles have an attacking throw-in.
Miami's Victor Ulloa looks ok and returns to the pitch.
